data.title: 屏幕录制入口
data.content: <p><span style="font-weight: bold;"><span style="color: #666666;">附二：屏幕录制入口</span></span><br /><span style="color: #666666;"><span style="font-weight: bold;">（1）安卓Android手机：</span>从屏幕顶部向下滑动两次 > 快捷按钮 > 点击屏幕录制（若找不到按钮，则点击编辑，添加屏幕录制按钮），<a style="transition-duration: 0.4s, 0s, 0s, 0s; transition-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.175, 0.885, 0.32, 1), ease, ease, ease; transition-delay: 0s, 0s, 0s, 0s;" href="androidCourse">图文教程</a>。</span><br /><span style="color: #666666;"><span style="font-weight: bold;">（2）苹果IOS手机：</span>设置 > 控制中心 > 添加录屏按钮 > 从屏幕顶部向下滑动 > 点击屏幕录制，<a style="transition-duration: 0.4s, 0s, 0s, 0s; transition-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.175, 0.885, 0.32, 1), ease, ease, ease; transition-delay: 0s, 0s, 0s, 0s;" href="iosCourse">图文教程</a>。</span></p>
